name: node-app-skeleton
description: Sample node.js app skeleton using Hapi.js

scripts.test:name: docker-compose run -e NODE_ENV=test-docker-local -e NODE_CONFIG_DIR=/app/src/config web /app/node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha /app/src/test/unit --recursive --grep
scripts.db:up:all: npm run db:up && npm run db:up:seed
scripts.db:down:all: npm run db:down:seed && npm run db:down
scripts.db:resetAndUp: npm run db:initialSetup && npm run db:up:all
scripts.db:initialSetup: node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate --config ./src/config/databaseSetup.js --migrations-dir ./src/migrations down:_setup && node node_modules/db-migrate/bin/db-migrate --config ./src/config/databaseSetup.js --migrations-dir ./src/migrations up:_setup

author: Jonathan Fulton
